verses.verse: Who <S%H4310><s%> is as the <S%H2450>wise<s%> man? and <S%H4310>who<s%> <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> the <S%H6592>interpretation<s%> of a <S%H1697>thing?<s%> a <S%H120>man's<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> maketh his <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine,<s%> and the <S%H5797>boldness<s%> of his <S%H6440>face<s%> shall be <S%H8132>changed.<s%>
I <S%H589><s%> counsel thee to <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H6310>commandment,<s%> and that in <S%H5921>regard<s%> <S%H1700><s%> of the <S%H7621>oath<s%> of <S%H430>God.<s%>

Be <S%H408>not<s%> <S%H926>hasty<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> out of his <S%H4480>sight:<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> in an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> he <S%H6213>doeth<s%> <S%H3605>whatsoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> <S%H2654>pleaseth<s%> him.
Where <S%H834><s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of a <S%H4428>king<s%> is, there is <S%H7983>power:<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> may <S%H559>say<s%> unto him, <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H6213>doest<s%> thou?

Whoso <S%H8104>keepeth<s%> the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> shall <S%H3045>feel<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>thing:<s%> and a wise <S%H2450>man's<s%> <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H3045>discerneth<s%> both <S%H6256>time<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> to <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H2656>purpose<s%> there <S%H3426>is<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> and <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> <S%H3588>therefore<s%> the <S%H7451>misery<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> is <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him.

For <S%H3588><s%> he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H4100>that<s%> which shall <S%H7945>be:<s%> <S%H1961><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H5046>tell<s%> him <S%H834>when<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be?<s%>

There is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> that hath <S%H7989>power<s%> over the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> to <S%H3607>retain<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H7307>spirit;<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> hath he <S%H7983>power<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4194>death:<s%> and there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H4917>discharge<s%> in that <S%H4421>war;<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> <S%H4422>deliver<s%> <S%H853><s%> those that are <S%H1167>given<s%> to it.

All <S%H3605><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> have I <S%H7200>seen,<s%> and <S%H5414>applied<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H3820>heart<s%> unto <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun:<s%> there is a <S%H6256>time<s%> <S%H834>wherein<s%> one <S%H120>man<s%> ruleth <S%H7980>over<s%> <S%H120>another<s%> to his own <S%H7451>hurt.<s%>

And <S%H3651>so<s%> I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H6912>buried,<s%> who had <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H1980>gone<s%> from the <S%H4480>place<s%> <S%H4725><s%> of the <S%H6918>holy,<s%> and they were <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> they had <S%H3651>so<s%> <S%H6213>done:<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

Because <S%H834><s%> sentence <S%H6599>against<s%> an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> is <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H4120>speedily,<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> is fully <S%H4390>set<s%> in them to <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil.<s%>

Though <S%H834><s%> a <S%H2398>sinner<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> a hundred <S%H3967>times,<s%> and his days be <S%H748>prolonged,<s%> <S%H3588>yet<s%> <S%H1571>surely<s%> <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> it shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2896>well<s%> with them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> him:

But it shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H2896>well<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> shall he <S%H748>prolong<s%> his <S%H3117>days,<s%> which are as a <S%H6738>shadow;<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> he <S%H3372>feareth<s%> <S%H369>not<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>

There <S%H3426>is<s%> a <S%H1892>vanity<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> there <S%H3426>be<s%> <S%H6662>just<s%> men, unto <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H413><s%> it <S%H5060>happeneth<s%> according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked;<s%> again, there <S%H3426>be<s%> <S%H7563>wicked<s%> men, <S%H413>to<s%> whom it <S%H7945>happeneth<s%> <S%H5060><s%> according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous:<s%> I <S%H559>said<s%> that this <S%H2088>also<s%> <S%H7945><s%> <S%H1571><s%> is <S%H1892>vanity.<s%>

Then <S%H589>I<s%> <S%H7623>commended<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H8057>mirth,<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> hath <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2896>better<s%> thing <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> <S%H3588>than<s%> <S%H518><s%> to <S%H398>eat,<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and to be <S%H8055>merry:<s%> for <S%H1931>that<s%> shall <S%H3867>abide<s%> with him of his <S%H5999>labor<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of his <S%H2416>life,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> him <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun.<s%>

When <S%H834><s%> I <S%H5414>applied<s%> <S%H853><s%> mine <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6045>business<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H3588>(for<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> there is that <S%H369>neither<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> nor <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H7200>seeth<s%> <S%H8142>sleep<s%> with his eyes: <S%H5869>)<s%>

Then I <S%H7200>beheld<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H3808>cannot<s%> <S%H3201><s%> find <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> is <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> the <S%H8121>sun:<s%> <S%H7945>because<s%> <S%H834>though<s%> a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H5998>labor<s%> to seek it <S%H1245>out,<s%> yet he shall <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4672>find<s%> it; <S%H1571>yea<s%> further; <S%H518>though<s%> a <S%H2450>wise<s%> man <S%H559>think<s%> to <S%H3045>know<s%> it, yet shall he <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H4672>find<s%> it.
